summary: Implements an analysis pass for the Qiskit transpiler that examines a circuit’s directed‑acyclic‑graph representation and determines how many independent tensor (sub‑system) factors the circuit can be decomposed into, recording this count in the pass’s property set.
business_intent: Enable the transpiler to assess circuit separability, informing optimization, parallel execution, and resource‑estimation decisions by exposing the number of tensor components present.
